text: @RachelReevesMP @beefkr10z You could say the same about the 'daily' updates on Covid-19 from my company, they too have been getting more and more sparse. The answer is simple, we DO NOT NEED TO KNOW THE SAME THINGS DAY IN DAY OUT IF THEY ARE NOT SIGNIFICANT CHANGES. I thought you might be smarter.
